Sentencas: CeO2/BaCeO3 based electrolytes, mixtures of oxygen ion and proton conductors, are promising in the application of solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs).
Titulo: Grain boundary conduction behaviors of ultra-fine grained CeO2/BaCeO3 based electrolytes

Sentencas: However, their grain boundary conduction behaviors are still unclear.
Titulo: Grain boundary conduction behaviors of ultra-fine grained CeO2/BaCeO3 based electrolytes

Sentencas: Herein, Sm, Bi co-doping CeO2/BaCeO3 electrolytes (80 wt% Ce0.8Sm0.1Bi0.1O2-delta - 20 wt% Ce0.8Sm0.1Bi0.1O2-delta, BiSDC-BCSBi) with ultra-fine grained (110-220 nm) and micron (1-1.8 mu m) structures were prepared.
Titulo: Grain boundary conduction behaviors of ultra-fine grained CeO2/BaCeO3 based electrolytes

Sentencas: In the ultra-fine grained structure, specific grain-boundary conductivities measured at 350 degrees C and 400 degrees C are 1-2 orders of magnitude higher than micron structures, thus resulting in dramatically enhanced electrical performances, which can be attributed to two aspects.
Titulo: Grain boundary conduction behaviors of ultra-fine grained CeO2/BaCeO3 based electrolytes

Sentencas: One is the decrease of space charge potential Delta phi(0) (0.165 V for ultrafine-fine grained ones, 0.396 V for micron ones).
Titulo: Grain boundary conduction behaviors of ultra-fine grained CeO2/BaCeO3 based electrolytes

Sentencas: The other is the dilution of impurities (the impurity blocking term omega/d(g) is 0.94 for ultrafine-fine grained ones, and 0.53 for micron ones).
Titulo: Grain boundary conduction behaviors of ultra-fine grained CeO2/BaCeO3 based electrolytes

Sentencas: In the ultra-fine grained electrolytes, no extra electronic conduction is introduced, and the ion migration number of O2- is higher than that of H+.
Titulo: Grain boundary conduction behaviors of ultra-fine grained CeO2/BaCeO3 based electrolytes
